roleset.name: to divide into parts and distribute

example.name: parcel_out-v: all arguments
example.text: The newspaper Leninskoye Zamya said the committee decided the plan to parcel out economic powers previously exercised by Moscow to the country 's 15 republics `` does n't reflect the radical changes in the Soviet federation . ''

propbank.arg: economic powers previously exercised by Moscow

roleset.note: PARCEL_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'parcel' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from parcel.01-v predicate notes)
